channel.title: katie's journal
channel.description: Thoughts about college life, computer science, artificial intelligence and philosophy

item.title: Finally Finished!!
item.description:
Holy crap, I finally have my own little home on the Internet! Iâ€™ve built lots of websites in the past, but none with so much effort as this one. My bed mattress probably has a dent in it from me having laid on it for like, two days straight.

So many languages to assemble together this with Jekyll. Along with HTML/CSS (which was expected), there was some impromptu YAML, Liquid, and Markdown language learning.

Poor documentation made building Jekyll on GitHub Pages way harder than it needed to be!! Argh. For the soul out there that landed here through Google, here are some fixes I had to
